description: Use this operation to retrieve information about a resource-based policy that is attached to an app monitor.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the app monitor that is associated with the resource-based policy that you want to view.

nested_items.name: PolicyDocument
nested_items.description: The JSON policy document that you requested.

nested_items.name: PolicyRevisionId
nested_items.description: The revision ID information for this version of the policy document that you requested.
